metadata.title: CVE-2015-7945 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: The RESTful control interface (aka RAPI or ganeti-rapi) in Ganeti before2.9.7, 2.10.x before 2.10.8, 2.11.x before 2.11.8, 2.12.x before 2.12.6,2.13.x before 2.13.3, 2.14.x before 2.14.2, and 2.15.x before 2.15.2 allowsremote attackers to obtain the DRBD secret via instance information jobresults.

criterions.comment: ganeti: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
